snippet: Despite its pioneering work with all-digital designs, Dassault faces a challenging future in both its military and private-jet businesses.
abstract: Dassault Aviation faces challenging future in both its military and private-jet businesses; company is profitable, but is fighting to maintain its footing after financial crisis eroded demand for flashy businesses jets and austerity measures cut European defense budgets.
lead_paragraph: Despite its pioneering work with all-digital designs, Dassault faces a challenging future in both its military and private-jet businesses.

headline.seo: Dassault Approaches Crossroad in Fractured Jet Industry
headline.main: A French Jet Maker Is Approaching a Crossroad
headline.print_headline: A French Jet Maker Is Approaching a Crossroad
